Uses of Class
org.apache.lucene.search.highlight.WeightedSpanTerm

  • Packages that use WeightedSpanTerm 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.search.highlight
    The highlight package contains classes to provide "keyword in context" features typically used to highlight search terms in the text of results pages.

    • Uses of WeightedSpanTerm in org.apache.lucene.search.highlight
